How to Contribute

Source: .github/CONTRIBUTING.md

Contributions, issues, and fixes are welcome!

If making changes to data, this must be done to the raw txt files. The generate_data.R script automates creating the RDA files and accompanying documentation.

  1. Fork and clone the repo

  2. Install the pre-commit hooks

  3. Create a new branch

    git checkout -b my-branch

  4. Make your changes

    • Run the generate_data.R script if you made changes to the raw txt files or data documentation
    • Render README.md from README.qmd if you made changes to the README

  5. Ensure all {testthat} tests pass

    devtools::test()

  6. Submit a PR

Developed by Jordan Bradford.

Site built with pkgdown 2.1.0.
